com.vmware.vapi.l10n

Class Java8Utf8BundleProvider.Utf8Control

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.ResourceBundle.Control
      • com.vmware.vapi.l10n.Java8Utf8BundleProvider.Utf8Control
  • Enclosing class:
    Java8Utf8BundleProvider

    public static class Java8Utf8BundleProvider.Utf8Control
extends java.util.ResourceBundle.Control
    Derived from ResourceBundle.Control. Control implementation which supports ResourceBundle creation from UTF-8 encoded property files.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class java.util.ResourceBundle.Control

        FORMAT_CLASS, FORMAT_DEFAULT, FORMAT_PROPERTIES, TTL_DONT_CACHE, TTL_NO_EXPIRATION_CONTROL

    • Method Detail

      • newBundle

        public java.util.ResourceBundle newBundle(java.lang.String baseName,
                                          java.util.Locale locale,
                                          java.lang.String format,
                                          java.lang.ClassLoader loader,
                                          boolean reload)
                                   throws java.lang.IllegalAccessException,
                                          java.lang.InstantiationException,
                                          java.io.IOException
        The implementation overrides the PropertyResourceBundle creation exclusively. When `java.properties` format is specified, i.e. the ResourceBundle is to be loaded from a properties file, the assumed encoding is UTF-8 rather than ISO-8859-1. For other cases the behavior is the same as in ResourceBundle.Control#newBundle.
        Overrides:
        newBundle in class java.util.ResourceBundle.Control
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalAccessException
        java.lang.InstantiationException
        java.io.IOException
